ATTACHMENT ID: 12900113 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Fixing UT failures. [~sershe], those code are there before HIVE-16774, I just bring those back.

Well, perhaps the code should be improved? As far as I understand AST cannot have null objects but it will fail if you call .get(index) and the node doesn't exist. [~ashutoshc] might know this better.
